snippet: A proposal sent by the White House to Capitol Hill on Wednesday would formally give the president the power to continue the airstrikes he has been conducting since last fall against the Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: A proposal sent by the White House to Capitol Hill on Wednesday would formally give the president the power to continue the airstrikes he has been conducting since last fall against the Islamic State.

headline.main: Obama’s Resolution to Authorize Military Force Against ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
